name: com.unity.uiwidgets
description:
UIWidgets allows you to build beautiful cross-platform apps through Unity.

The UIWidgets installed from here has removed Resources and Plugins folder. You may be prompted to import the required resources. The resources are also available at https://github.com/UIWidgets/Resources.

If you need to build for Android, iOS or WebGL, you need to download the plugins manually from https://github.com/UIWidgets/Plugins.
